‚Äâ I have been dealing with this bs since I was a pre-teen, so like 26 yrs (sheesh time flies!) . In that time I've tried all the dandruff shampoos, all the derm prescriptions, and some specialty products I've come across. I honestly don't know if it was one, or some, or all of these things that got me here today, but here's what I did‚Ä¶ - Before washing, I sprayed my scalp with a 4:1 mix of water:xylitol (you read that right. The sweetener). I left it in long enough that it dried but I don't think it mattered. Reapplied right before washing too, for good measure. This step was the only thing I've never tried before. *I measured this out in grams btw, because I take ratios seriously - I butchered what was left of my $40 Briogeo Scalp Revival Megastrength shampoo (it wasn't working anymore anyway üôÑ) by adding an unmeasured, incalculable amount of additional pure salicylic acid (but honestly not much), mct (c8, c10) oil, and tea tree oil. NOTHING I've tried has allowed me 2 weeks of normalcy without having to do ANYthing extra. Not ever.
